title: Vadim Abdullayev
text:
Vadim Abdullayev (; born on 17 December 1994) is an <a href="Azerbaijan">Azerbaijan</a>i <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who last played for <a href="Sabah%20FK">Sabah</a> in the <a href="Azerbaijan%20Premier%20League">Azerbaijan Premier League</a>.
Club career.
On 5 May 2012, Abdullayev made his debut in the <a href="Azerbaijan%20Premier%20League">Azerbaijan Premier League</a> for <a href="Baku%20FC">Baku</a> match against <a href="Neft%C3%A7i%20PFK">Neftçi Baku</a>.
